name: Flappy Raven
description:
Flappy Raven 🐣 Introduction:

My own Flappy Bird clone made in Godot 3.5. The foundation is based on my tutorial (for Godot 4), but at the time of writing this the export functionality of Godot 4 is still broken, so I had to convert it to Godot 3.5.

Try to avoid the wind turbines 💨 and the thunderclouds 🌩️. Have fun and let me know what you think!

PS: I don't want to imply that wind turbines are bad and kill birds. According to this study, domestic cats currently kill more birds per year than wind turbines.

Controls:
  • Fly: Press SPACE
Showcase: Tutorial for Godot 4:
